lyrics:
34 contributorsburnin’ up lyricsverse 1 joe jonas
im hot youre cold
you go around like you know
who i am but you dont
youve got me on my toes

chorus nick jonas
im slipping into the lava
and im trying to keep from going under
baby who turned the temperature hotter
cause im burnin up burnin up for you baby
come on girl

verse 2 joe jonas  nick jonas
i fell i fell so fast so fast
cant hold myself back
high heels high heels red dress red dress
all by yourself gotta catch my breath

chorus nick jonas
im slipping into the lava
and im trying to keep from going under
baby who turned the temperature hotter
cause im burnin up burnin up for you baby

bridge nick jonas
walk in the room all i can see is you oh
staring me down i know you feel it too
see jonas brothers liveget tickets as low as 30you might also likechorus nick jonas
im slipping into the lava
and im trying to keep from going under
baby who turned the temperature hotter
cause im burnin up burnin up for you baby
slipping into the lava
and im trying to keep from going under
baby who turned the temperature hotter
cause im burnin up burnin up for you baby

verse 3 big rob  nick jonas  joe jonas
yo were burning up in this place tonight
your brothers sing it loud and were feeling right
get up and dance dont try and fight it
big robs for real and thats no lie
stop drop and roll and touch the floor
it keeps on burnin up more and more
i got jb with me laying it down
come on boys let’s bring the chorus around

chorus nick jonas  big rob
im slipping into the lava
and im trying to keep from going under yeah
baby who turned the temperature hotter come on man
cause im burnin up burnin up for you baby
outro nick jonas  big rob
burnin up sup burnin up for you baby19embed
